title: Asriel's Artwork Page
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

Welcome! This is [[*user W Asriel]]'s artwork page. I am a user from the CN branch and I'm glad to make some artworks for those SCPs and tales I really liked. 
Most of of these are made of epoxy resin. I hope you enjoy!

++ Epoxy Resin Works
[[collapsible show="◆ SCP-3201" hide="◇ We archive."]]
= [[[scp-3201|Well, it was low-entropy while it lasted.]]]

[[/collapsible]]

++ Others

[[collapsible show="◆ SCP-4343" hide="◇ Bugs are never truly conquered."]]
= [[[scp-4343|You will be free]]]
This image was made by Magica Voxel, a free voxel art editor which can be downloaded [[[https://ephtracy.github.io/|here]]].
